prompts: Create a punk-inspired Pokemon with vibrant colors and a rebellious attitude.
Show me an electric-type Pokemon that dances to its own rhythm in the wild.
Design a Pokemon with a unique body shape that combines elements of both humanoid and electric features.
Imagine a rock band of Pokemon, including one that resembles a colorful, electric guitarist.
Make a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, known for its loud music and electric vibes.
Generate a Pokemon that can evolve into different forms based on its electric energy levels.
Give me a Pokemon with spiky features and an attitude that commands attention.
